The Good Robot the Bad Robot and the Man That Created Them

Artificial intelligence is intelligence displayed by machines. What happens when you give them emotions to feel happiness and anger? Zonite is an artificial intelligence, made to bring joy to the world, but what happens when his creator, Professor John, makes a new AI, smarter and more human than him? How will Zonite cope, especially with evil lurking around? Will Zonite get over his feelings and welcome the new AI, or will he let anger take over instead?
